select organization_id as id, organization_name as name, organization_code as code, parent_id as "parentId", iorder from sys_organization so where 1=1
and not exists( select organization_id from ( with recursive r as( select * from sys_organization where organization_id = #{organizationId} union all select p.* from sys_organization p, r where r.organization_id = p.parent_id ) select organization_id from r ) as tmp where tmp.organization_id = so.organization_id )
order by iorder
